name: The BET Crewneck
desc: The ultimate debugger's uniform. Warm enough to keep you cozy during late-night coding sessions, and stylish enough to conceal the fact you've worn it three days in a row. Because, let's face it, who has time to pick out clothes when there's code to be written?

name: The BET T-shirt
desc: Every coder's must-have. It's not just a T-shirt, it's a statement. 'Yes, I can fix your computer,' but also, 'No, I will not do it for free.' Available in multiple shades of 'I write better code than I dress.'

name: The BET Hoodie
desc: For the coder who knows no season. Whether you're battling the air conditioning or the bleak midwinter, this hoodie has got you covered, literally. Plus, the hoodie pocket is the perfect place to stash snack rations during those marathon debugging sessions.

name: The BET Long Sleeve
desc: For those who code long into the night and need an extra layer of comfort. It's like a warm hug from your IDE – comforting, supportive, and slightly restrictive when you try to refactor.

name: The BET Raglan Tshirt
desc: The official uniform for 'it's not a bug, it's a feature' discussions. Sleek enough for a client meeting, comfortable enough for smashing your keyboard in frustration.

name: The BET Zip Pullover
desc: Perfect for when you have to leave your coding cave and face the 'outside'. Zip it up to conceal your 'I'd rather be coding' T-shirt. Features a handy pocket for your smartphone – because you never know when you'll need to Google an error message.

name: The BET Tshirt Dress
desc: Because why should you have to choose between being comfortable and looking like you're ready for a code review? It's as versatile as a Swiss Army knife, but for fashion.

name: The BET Mens Pajamas
desc: For the late-night debugger or the home office warrior, these pajamas offer comfort and flexibility for those moments when you fall asleep on your keyboard.

name: The BET Ladies Pajamas
desc: Soft, comfortable, and ready for a coding marathon or a Netflix binge (because sometimes you need a break from Stack Overflow). The perfect attire for debugging your dreams.

name: The BET Golf Shirt
desc: For the rare occasion when a developer sees sunlight and decides to hit the golf course. This shirt is optimized for performance, much like your code. Except it won't crash if you don't hit par.

name: The BET Game Socks
desc: Keep your feet warm and your steps quiet as you sneak up to raid the fridge at 2 AM during a coding spree. Bonus: the friction coefficient ensures minimal slippage when you're knee-deep in code and pizza boxes.

name: The BET Windbreaker
desc: For those windy days when the AC in the office is set to 'Antarctica'. A sleek, aerodynamic design that says, 'Yes, I'm ready to deploy', even if it's just deploying yourself out the door.

name: The BET Backpack
desc: Carry your laptop, gadgets, and the burden of unresolved bugs in style. This backpack comes with extra padding to protect your tech and a hidden compartment for those secret snacks.

name: The BET Fanny Pack
desc: Retro, functional, and a bit ironic. The perfect accessory for storing all your developer essentials: USB drives, spare batteries, and that elusive semicolon.

name: The BET Bucket Hat
desc: Because sunburns on your brain are a real threat when you think too hard about recursive functions under the open sky. Also ideal for hiding bad hair days, which are every day when you're up late coding.

name: The BET Flipflops
desc: The official footwear of developers working from home. Offers the perfect balance between comfort and the minimal effort required to prepare for those video call meetings where you only need to dress up from the waist up.

name: The BET Beanie
desc: Not just a fashion statement, but a symbol of the eternal struggle against office AC settings. Also perfect for those who haven't seen a barber since 'just one more feature' became a full-blown development sprint.

name: The BET Toque
desc: For the developer who knows that brain freeze isn't just something that happens when you eat ice cream too fast, but also when you're trying to understand legacy code without comments.

name: The BET Beach Towel
desc: Perfect for those rare occasions when you actually remember to log off and go outside. This beach towel is not only soft and highly absorbent but also doubles as a comfortable makeshift workstation on the sand.

name: The BET Beer Sleeve
desc: Because the only thing better than your code compiling with no errors is grabbing a cold one without it leaving condensation on your desk. Keeps your drink cool and your workstation dry.

name: The BET Desk Calendar
desc: A relic of a bygone era when people used to track dates without a digital reminder. This desk calendar is perfect for those who like to physically cross out days until the next code deployment or holiday.

name: The BET Car Plate
desc: Because even your car deserves to show off your geek side. This custom plate is the perfect way to tell the world you'd rather be coding... or at least not stuck in traffic.

name: The BET Coffee Blend
desc: Engineered for peak performance in the most critical of all developer tools: the coffee maker. This blend is robust, reliable, and capable of powering through even the toughest of debugging sessions.

name: The BET Wham-O Frisbee
desc: Because even coders need to occasionally commit to something offline. This high-performance frisbee is perfect for park debugging sessions and catching some sun (and maybe, just maybe, other humans).

name: The BET Golf Balls
desc: Hit a hole in one with these golf balls, designed for coders who know the importance of a well-aimed function call. Warning: may not improve your game but will definitely improve your style.

name: The BET Coffee Mug
desc: This mug holds the elixir of programming power. Perfect for the mornings when your brain is in debug mode and needs a caffeine patch to function properly.

name: The BET Lunch Bag
desc: Keep your snacks secure and your beverages chilled with this lunch bag. Ideal for developers who calculate lunch break durations in code compile times.

name: The BET Notebook
desc: For those rare moments when you need to jot down something other than code. Or, more likely, for doodling during those endless video calls.

name: The BET Pet Bandana
desc: Because your pet should represent your coder lifestyle too. This bandana is for the developer's best friend who's always there, even during the 3 AM bug fixes.

name: The BET Collective Sticker
desc: Stick it on your laptop, water bottle, or your coworker's back. This sticker is a symbol of unity among developers who understand the pain of misplaced semicolons.

name: The BET Travel Mug
desc: For the coder on the go. Whether you're traveling between your desk and your bed or the great outdoors, this mug keeps your drink at the perfect temperature, much like your well-optimized code.

name: The BET Apple Watch Band
desc: For those who live by the code and wish to wear their heart (rate monitor) on their sleeve. This Apple Watch band not only keeps you on time for your next scrum meeting but also stylishly in sync with your favorite IDE theme.

name: The BET Water Bottle
desc: Stay hydrated while you hydrate your code with fresh ideas. This water bottle is a developer's best friend, next to the coffee mug, of course. Perfect for those long hours of trying to understand what you wrote last week.

name: The BET Wine Glass
desc: Celebrate the deployment of your latest project or drown the sorrows of your latest bug hunt. This wine glass is the perfect companion for late-night coding or relaxing after a hard day's work.

name: The BET Charging Pad
desc: Because the only thing more satisfying than your code compiling is watching your device charge wirelessly. This charging pad keeps your gadgets fueled up and ready to go, much like coffee does for you.

name: The BET Desktop Pad
desc: Enhance your desk's aesthetic with a desktop pad that's as smooth as your code. It provides a vast expanse for your mouse to roam freely, much like your thoughts while coding.

name: The BET Ear Buds
desc: Isolate yourself from the world and tune into your coding zone. These earbuds are perfect for listening to your favorite coding jams or blocking out the noise in an open office.

name: The BET Laptop Bag
desc: Safeguard your most prized possession (your laptop, obviously) with a bag that's as durable as your will to code through the night. With ample storage for all your peripherals, it's the coder's ultimate travel companion.

name: The BET Luggage Tag
desc: Mark your territory with a luggage tag that screams 'I'd rather be coding.' Perfect for those rare occasions when you can't avoid leaving the comfort of your local development environment.

name: The BET iPhone Case
desc: Protect your iPhone with a case designed for the developer on the move. It's like a try-catch block for your phone, catching drops and bumps with ease.

name: The BET Baby Onesie
desc: Start their coding journey early with this comfortable onesie, because it's never too soon to teach them about the importance of closing their tags. Plus, it's great for those midnight debugging sessions - babies and code alike.

name: The BET Christmas Bulb
desc: Brighten your holiday season with a bulb that's as unique as your favorite algorithm. Perfect for the developer who likes to solve problems, including how to make their Christmas tree look algorithmically perfect.

name: The BET Hooded Towel
desc: For the little developer-in-training in your life, this hooded towel not only keeps them warm and dry but also ready to dive into the pool of coding knowledge. Or, you know, an actual pool.

name: The BET Backyard Apron
desc: Perfect for the grill master who codes as well as they cook. This apron protects against spills and splatters, whether you're flipping burgers or flipping through stacks of code.

name: The BET Teddy Stuffie
desc: Each plushie is 8 tall, features polyester and plastic pellet stuffing, while their tees are 100% cotton. Perfect for ages 3+.
